display_long_description:
"Neon Velocity" is an electrifying futuristic racing game that puts players in the driver's seat of high-tech motorcycles, challenging them to navigate through neon-lit tracks filled with obstacles straight out of the iconic world of "Tron Legacy." With a unique twist that sets it apart from traditional racing games, "Neon Velocity" incorporates head movement as a key mechanic for controlling the motorcycle and overcoming the thrilling challenges that lie ahead.

Core Mechanics & Features:

Head Movement Control: Players will use head movements, detected through compatible VR or motion-sensing technology, to steer their motorcycles with precision. Tilting and turning your head will translate directly into the bike's movements on the track, offering an immersive and intuitive control experience.
Obstacle Courses: Inspired by the visually striking aesthetics of "Tron Legacy," the game features intricate obstacle courses with neon barriers, twisting pathways, and challenging traps that demand quick reflexes and strategic head movements to navigate successfully.
